article_title: A Conversation with Memphis Mayor A. C. Wharton
article_text:
For the past few years, Here & Now has been checking in with A. C. Wharton, the Mayor of Memphis, Tennessee, about how issues like the economy, the Affordable Care Act, politics, and race and policing.

He’s about to leave office after six years, so Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson checked in with Mayor Wharton again to look back at the year and at his time as mayor.

Guest

article_metadata.description: This annual check-in with Mayor Wharton will be our last, as he's about to leave office. We look back at the year and at his time as mayor.
